answers.answer: Your body needs all that water plus it prevents leg cramps.

It is very normal. I'm 36w 4 days and I drink about a gallon a day, no lie. I'm Def not dehydrated but I feel thirsty all day. My mouth gets dry and my throat gets super dry if I don't constantly drink, I do so all day and suck on hard candy bc I get dry mouth so easily..my doc said it's normal tho, my baby girl just takes a lot out of me! I'm super hydrated tho
This is sooo funny because i was just thinking this at work today. I am constantly thirsty and mainly want ice cold water. I am 9 weeks as of today.
I'm 17 weeks and 3 days. I've seen on google that, that means I'm in my 5th month of pregnancy now, but my friend says I'm still in the 4th month. Which one is it??
your still 4 months at 17 weeks. You will be 5months at 20 weeks

Your First Trimester:1st Month = Weeks 1,2,3,42nd Month = Weeks 5,6,7,83rd Month = Weeks 9,10,11,12,13Your Second Trimester:4th Month = Wks 14,15,16,175th Month = Wks 18,19,20,216th Month = Wks 22,23,24,25,26Your Third Trimester:7th Month = Wks 27,28,29,308th Month = Wks 31,32,33,34,359th Month = Wks 36,37,38,39,40

question: I feel like I'm excessively thirst 24/7  is this normal? I will be 6 weeks tomorrow. I have always been a serious water drinker and I feel like I am drinking even more water lol.. could this be a sign of diabetes or does my baby just need all this water?Tia from ftm ♡
title: thirsty
